text:
METEOROLOGICAL JOURNAL,

KEPT BY THE ASSISTANT SECRETARY,

AT THE APARTMENTS OF THE

ROYAL SOCIETY,

BY ORDER OF

THE PRESIDENT AND COUNCIL.

OBSERVANDA.

Height of the Cistern of the Barometer above a Fixed Mark on Waterloo Bridge..............=83 feet 2½ in.
above the mean level of the Sea (presumed about) ....=95 feet.

The External Thermometer is 2 feet higher than the Barometer Cistern.

Height of the Receiver of the Rain Gauge above the Court of Somerset House.............=79 feet.

The hours of observation are of Mean Time, the day beginning at Midnight.

The Thermometers are graduated by Fahrenheit's Scale.

The Barometer is divided into inches and decimals.
| Date | Barometer (mm Hg) | Temperature (°C) | Barometer (mm Hg) | Temperature (°C) | Dew Point (°C) | External Thermometer | Rain (mm) | Direction of Wind | Remarks |
|------|------------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|------------------|----------|------------------|---------|
| July |                 |                 |                 |                 |                 |                   |          |                  |         |

**REMARKS**
- Light wind—A.M. Slightly lowering, P.M. Fine—light clouds.
- Fluffy light clouds—A.M. Light windy, P.M. Clear.
- Overcast—P.M. Fair—cloudless, A.M. Clear, P.M. Fine.
- Fine—light clouds, wind—A.M. Clear, P.M. Fine, very near clear.

### MEANS

| 30.114 | 62.9 | 30.089 | 65.7 | 55.8 | 59.8 | 65.8 | 54.1 | 67.3 | .582 |

Mean of Barometer, corrected for Capil. 9 A.M. 3 P.M. larity and reduced to 32° Fahr. …… 30.026 29.992

---

**W** Fine and cloudless.—A.M. Light haze. P.M. Light wind.

**T** Fine and cloudless. A.M. Light haze and wind. P.M. Very clear.

**F** A.M. Strong haze—cloudless. P.M. Fine—hazy.

**S** A.M. Strong fog. P.M. Clear and cloudless.

**O** A.M. Strong haze—cloudless. P.M. Fine and cloudless—light cloudiness.

**M** Fine and cloudless—hazy.

**T** Fine and cloudless—light streaked cloudiness—Evening, clear, light cloud.

**W** Fine and cloudless—light wind. P.M. Fine and clear—light streaked cloudiness.

**T** Light wind.—A.M. Light cloudy. P.M. Fine—lightest cloud.

**F** Fine—light clouds and wind.—Clear, p.m.

**S** Fine—A.M. Cloudless. P.M. Clear—thin flocculent clouds, and light wind.

**O** Hazy—Fine—light cloudiness, p.m. Evening, local haze—clear.

**M** Fine and cloudless.—Few light clouds and cloudiness, a.m.

**T** Fine—soft floating clouds.—Clear, p.m.—Showers, noon and evening.

**W** Fine—light flocculent clouds.—Clear—light wind, p.m.

**T** Unsteady wind.—A.M. Fair & clear—light clouds. P.M. Cloudy—light wind, p.m.—Lightest wind, and almost no breeze.

**F** Strong unsteady breeze.—A.M. Fine and clear. P.M. Heavy rain—dark.

**S** Fine—cloudless—light brick wind—Evening, clear.

**O** Lightly cloudy—A.M. Light haze. P.M. Light breeze and cloud.

**M** Light clouds and breeze.—A.M. Light cloudy. Noon, showers.

**T** P.M. Fair and clear.

**W** Light haze—A.M.—light haze, p.m.

**T** Light cloudiness—Unsteady breeze.—Ev. light rain.

**F** Light brick wind—wind, p.m.—A.M. Losing deposition.

**S** P.M. Fair and clear—lightly cloudy.

**O** Fine—lightly thin clouds—light brick wind.

**M** Fine—nearly cloudless—light wind.

**T** Lightly overcast—light haze, p.m.

**W** Overcast—haze.

**T** Lightly cloudy—light haze and wind.

**F** Fine—lightly cloudy—light cloudiness, haze, and wind.

---

**MEANS**

| 30.059 | 54.3 | 30.034 | 56.8 | 48.7 | 51.4 | 57.2 | 46.2 | 58.2 | .185 |

Mean of Barometer, corrected for Capil. 9 A.M. 3 P.M. larity and reduced to 32° Fahr. …… 29.996 29.964

---

**Legend:**

- **N**: Fine and cloudless—A.M. Light haze. P.M. Light wind.
- **NE**: Fine and cloudless—A.M. Light haze and wind. P.M. Very clear.
- **E**: A.M. Strong haze—cloudless. P.M. Fine—hazy.
- **SE**: A.M. Strong fog. P.M. Clear and cloudless.
- **S**: A.M. Strong haze—cloudless. P.M. Fine and cloudless—light cloudiness.
- **SW**: Fine and cloudless—hazy.
- **W**: Fine and cloudless—light streaked cloudiness—Evening, clear.
- **WSW**: Fine and cloudless—light wind. P.M. Fine and clear—light unsteady wind.
- **SSW**: Light wind—A.M. Lightly cloudy. P.M. Fine—light soft clouds.
- **SW**: Fine—light clouds and wind—Clear, p.m.
- **NW**: A.M. Cloudless. P.M. Clear—thin flocculent clouds, and light wind.
- **WSW**: Fine and cloudless—light haze. P.M. Evening, local haze—clear.
- **SSW**: Fine and cloudless—few light clouds and cloudiness, a.m.
- **SSW**: Fine and cloudless—light haze. P.M. Noon, showers, and wind—clear.
- **WSW**: Fine—light flocculent clouds—Clear—light wind.
- **WSW**: Unsteady wind—A.M. Fair & clear—light cloud. P.M. Cloudy—light wind, and wind—unsteady breeze.
- **WSW**: Strong unsteady breeze. P.M. Fair and clear. P.M. Heavy rain—dark.
- **WSW**: Fine and cloudless—light brick wind—Evening, clear.
- **WSW**: Lightly cloudy—cloudless—light brick wind. P.M. Fair—lightly cloudy.
- **WSW**: Light clouds and breeze—A.M. Lightly cloudy. Noon, showers, and wind—clear.
- **WSW**: A.M. Fair and clear. P.M. Lightly cloudy—light wind.
- **WSW**: Light clouds and breeze—A.M. Lightly cloudy. Noon, showers, and wind—clear.
- **WSW**: Lightly cloudy—light haze. P.M. Fair—lightly cloudy.
- **WSW**: Lightly cloudy—light unsteady breeze—Ev. light rain.
- **WSW**: P.M. Fair and clear—lightly cloudy.
- **WSW**: Lightly cloudy—A.M. Fine and cloudless. P.M. Lightly cloudy, Evening, clear.
- **WSW**: Fine—light thin clouds—light brick wind.
- **WSW**: Fine—nearly cloudless—light wind.
- **WSW**: Lightly overcast and cloudy—light haze.
- **WSW**: Lightly overcast—light wind.
- **WSW**: Lightly cloudy—light haze and wind.
- **WSW**: Fine—lightly cloudy—light cloudiness, haze, and wind.
